whatIsService.title: What is Hair Regrowth Treatment?
whatIsService.content:
Hair is not just about appearance - it’s about identity, confidence, and self-esteem. Concerns like **reduced hair density**, **delayed regrowth**, or **alopecia areata (patchy hair loss)** can affect your everyday life.

At **The Skin Firm, NIBM, Pune**, we specialize in **personalized, dermatologist hair treatment and hair regrowth solutions that target the root cause of your hair problems.** Whether your goal is to restore density, stimulate new regrowth, or manage autoimmune hair loss because of alopecia areata, we provide treatments that are safe, effective, and long-lasting.

downtime.title: Downtime After Hair Regrowth Treatment
downtime.description:
Most hair regrowth and density treatments are **minimally invasive** with **no major downtime**.

- Mild redness or tingling may occur for 24-48 hours.
- Patients can usually resume normal activities the same day.

postCare.title: Post-Care After Hair Density Improvement & Regrowth Treatment

Avoid direct sun exposure for 2-3 days
Do not apply chemical-based hair products or oil for a few days

faqs.title: FAQs on Hair Regrowth Treatment in Pune

questions.question: Q1. How many sessions will I need for visible results?
questions.answer: Typically **6-8 sessions** are recommended, spaced 3-4 weeks apart. Maintenance may be advised.

questions.question: Q2. Are these Hair Density Improvement and Regrowth treatments safe?
questions.answer: Yes, all **Hair Density Improvement and Regrowth** treatments are dermatologist-supervised, using evidence-based methods and safe medical devices.

questions.question: Q3. When will I start seeing regrowth?
questions.answer: Most patients notice reduced hair fall within 1-2 months, and visible regrowth between 3-6 months.

questions.question: Q4. Will the results be permanent?
questions.answer: Results are long-lasting, but maintenance sessions and lifestyle care are important for sustaining hair health.

questions.question: Q5. Can alopecia areata be completely cured?
questions.answer: While alopecia areata can recur, treatments significantly improve hair regrowth and reduce patchiness.

questions.question: Q6. Is the treatment suitable for all age groups?
questions.answer: Yes, adults of all ages experiencing hair loss, thinning, or alopecia are eligible, depending on scalp assessment.

questions.question: Q7. Is there pain or discomfort?
questions.answer: Most treatments are well-tolerated. Numbing creams are applied where required, making the procedure comfortable.
